mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROD_MAC_PLM ( ID, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, MAC_NO, PERIOD_TIME, BEFORE_TIME, BEHIND_TIME, RUN_TOTAL, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{periodTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beforeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{behindTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_MAC_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_MAC_PLM
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MAC_NO = #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERIOD_TIME = #{periodTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BEFORE_TIME = #{beforeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BEHIND_TIME = #{behindTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RUN_TOTAL = #{runTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
